name: SHAPE☆SHIFT
description:
Ludum Dare Page

Jump and puzzle your way through SHAPE☆SHIFT!!

(Apparently some flickering might happen in the later areas on Windows... This was developed on mac, so I wasn't aware until after submitting. I'm currently looking into a way to fix the windows build, so, sorry about that! 🙇)

CONTROLS:

Move - wasd / arrow keys / gamepad axis 1 + 2

Jump - z / left click / gamepad button 1

Shift - x / right click / gamepad button 2

Reset to Checkpoint - r / gamepad button 6

Art by Rev!

Ludum Dare Page
